title: Serendipity
body:
by theOneAndOnlyMintStar

“You’re my penicillium
Saving me
My angel My world
I’m your calico cat
Waiting to greet you
Love me now Touch me now.”

(Yoonmin AU)
Or, where Yoongi cuts and Jimin tries to help

Series: Part 1 of Love Yourself

summary: AU Fan Fiction - The Seoul Conflict Chapter Forty Four
title: AU Fan Fiction - The Seoul Conflict Chapter Forty Four
body:
The Min compound was in full chaos for a week as wedding after wedding was performed.  The rainbow of colors displayed throughout the week would make a rainbow jealous.  

King Taehyung and Prince Junkook of the New Moon’s wedding was the first of the week.  It was simple with purple and white orchids.  Their sons were the flower boy and the ring bearer.  King Taehyung decided to go with a pure white suit with purple accents; it was made from lightweight material and very form fitted to his body.  Prince Jungkook wore a purple crushed velvet suit with white accents.  Both of their sons wore white with purple accents.  Prince Yoongi was best man and Hyuna was the maid of honor.  The ceremony was presided over by Elder Kim; mainly because weddings make Elder Jung cry like a baby.  It wasn’t your usual large pomp and circumstance that would normally accompany a royal wedding.  Only a hundred guests were invited and the reception that followed was an open pit BBQ with a small buffet.  It was set up in the open with no tents under a clear starry night.  The light from the half moon was just enough to create a mild glow while the rest of the lighting was small tea light candles floating in the fountains, ponds, and in glass vases on the tables.  It concluded with the garter toss; of which Taeyong caught.  And the bouquet toss; ten caught the bouquet unintentionally while taking the pups for a walk.  The following day was filled with preparations for Prince Chanyeol and Prince Baekhyun’s Vow Renewal on the following day.

The vow renewal was only for close friends and family.  It was decorated with silver and red sheer fabrics and with red and white roses.  Elder Kim once again presided over the service.  Prince Chanyeol of the Snow Moon was wearing a red suit with silver accents while Prince Baekhyun of the Undying Forest was wearing a silver suit with a red shirt and shoes.  It went well considering that Prince Baekhyun was in preheat.  Prince Chanyeol and Prince Baekhyun opted not to attend their reception so that they could prepare for Baekhyun’s heat.  The only thing of note to come from the reception was that Prince Hobi of the Dancing Lotus preposed to Prince Jimin of The Riverlands and that Jimin whole heartedly accepted.  

The next day the house was in full prep mode once again preparing for the next Min wedding; the union of the house of Min and the House of Kim.  Elder Kim once again presided over the ceremony and gave the familial blessing from the Kim family.  Princess CL of the Harvest Moon and Prince Ji-Won of the Dormant Rain had chosen to go with orange, brown, and yellow for their wedding colors.  Princess CL wore a traditional white gown but carried a bouquet of orange and yellow Crysanthemums.  Prince Ji-Won wore a nice tailored brown suit and held their daughter Soojin during the ceremony.  Soojin was dressed in an adorable brown dress with orange and yellow crysanthemums embroidered on the skirt.  Princess CL had stated that the dress was the inspiration for the color choses for their wedding and that her and Prince Ji-Won are inspired daily by the rambunctious 18 month old.  The reception that followed was your traditional affair; banquet style dining, open bar, dancing, and speeches.  Her three brothers all gave speeches as did all of the “Dolls”.  Hyuna also gave a speech to the beautiful couple.  And Elder Jung performed a blessing on the meal.  The whole event was very traditional.  The reception went until the early morning hours and resulted in more than a few drunken hookups.  All in all the event was a success and the talk of Seoul.  Many of the older wealthy residents and the other royal houses never thought Princess CL would marry; let alone marry a Prince of the Kim line.  

When the final guest exited the tent, the staff worked quickly to clean up and start setting up for what is being hailed by the royals and wealthy alike as the wedding of the century.  Prince Yoongi of the Blood Moon and Princess Aurora of the Rising Tide wanted a small affair but once the invitations were sent to the other royal houses; it became a huge deal.  With Prince Yoongi being the Mayor of Seoul and with him now being the most powerful man in all of Seoul; the other royal houses started making tributes to the Mins.  One house sent a beautiful white and pearl gown for Princess Aurora, another sent a set of gold crowns adorned with rubies, sapphires, and diamonds, another sent the males of the wedding party custom made black tuxedos, one house insisted on sending all of the flowers for the wedding, and the list goes on.  So much stuff was sent that the wedding was all prepared by outside royal houses.  CL and Hyuna were co-maids of honor and Jungkook and Chanyeol were the best men.  Soojin was the flower girl and the twins were co-ring bearers.  The wedding was presided over by both Elder Jung and Elder Kim.  The other royal houses demanded this so the ceremony could be held in both Latin and Korean.  Over 300 guests occupied the gardens during the wedding ceremony and there was a handful of journalist who were invited and who televised the wedding ceremony.  The reception was for friends, family, and the royal houses only.  And per tradition, it will last for three days.  

The first evening of the reception, a large banquet is held and all gifts are given.  The first evening ends with the coupling ceremony.  The ceremony consists of a blessed rope being tied around the adjoining hands of the married couple and then the elders guiding them to a special tent set up for the next part of the ritual.  Once in the tent, the rope is removed and the couple is striped of their clothes and lead to the union bed.  The heads of all of the royal houses are present for the sacred union.  The first official coupling is to occur under observation to watch for omens from the ancestors.  It is to be performed with no outside assistance such as drugs, elixirs, toys, etc.  Yoongi and Aurora have sex quickly so that the others will be satisfied and leave.  Once the heads of the royal houses are satisfied, Elder Kim and Elder Jung give the couple two small glasses of an elixir called the bonds of Aphrodite.  It is meant to put the drinker into a euphoric state as well as increase arousal.  Yoongi and Aurora are now left alone in the coupling tent.  The tent is then shielded by a spell of silence.  The spell seals the couple inside the tent and prevents them from leaving or any one from entering for twelve hours.  The spell also increases arousal and stamina in the couple.  They are expected to have sex for twelve hours straight.  If they survive then it is seen as a blessing from the ancestors and they will then be crowned King and Queen of Seoul.

The second evening began with a small concert and a banquet.  Prince Yoongi and Princess Aurora emerged from the coupling tent and entered the banquet tent.  Both have been bathed and adorned in attire fit for a future King and Queen.  Prince Yoongi is dressed in a beautiful red and black velvet suit while Princess Aurora is dressed in a floor length gown of red and black.  They are presented to the attending as the future King and Queen of Seoul.  The banquet continued and no obstacles presented themselves.  This evening more for the guests then it is the couple.  The guests are given an opportunity to either praise the couple or to denounce the couple.  Since there was no objections to them becoming King and Queen, the evening goes well and is concluded by a sequestering of the couple separately.  

Elder Kim accompanied Prince Yoongi to the preparation room and Elder Jung accompanied Princess Aurora.  The preparation room is where they will be cleaned, purified, oiled with sacred oils, and dressed for the coronation.  The coronation is to occur on the third night under the moon.  Yoongi and Aurora are allowed a few hours sleep before the arduous process begins.  Once prepared, they were lead by the Elders to the chamber of communication.  They were given the elixir of living death and are laid of satin bed rolls.  The elixir of living death allows the drinker to communicate with the dead and in their case their parents.  Once they were done, they were then lead to the gardens for the completion of the coronation.  

After the coronation, the guests are partake in the last feast for the wedding.  The banquet ends and all of the heads of the royal houses leave with their entourages.  The remaining friends and family stay for the next week to help the King and Queen with necessary royal obligations.  

Life returns to normal for the next 5 months.  The Min siblings running the city and rebuilding it.  Their spouses enjoying establishing the academy and beginning classes.  The elementals and the alcolytes have successfully established the magic academy in Busan and have a full house now.  Hyuna and the “Dolls” have almost doubled the revenue brought in by the clubs in Daegu and Jinhwan has decided to start an academy in Daegu for beings without magical powers or minimal powers.  King Yoongi gave his blessing and like the other academies, it is flourishing.  

The Min compound has been a flurry of activity lately because they are preparing for the birth of the royal heirs.  Midwives have been brought in and Elder Kim and Elder Jung have temporarily moved into the house.  The day continues to draw near.  The staff is excited because the royal heirs will be the first births in the house in over a hundred years.  It had been so long in fact that the birthing chamber in the basement had to be rebuilt and rechristened.  

“It will be soon.”  The doctor tells the King.

When the final guest exited the tent, the staff worked quickly to clean up and start setting up for what is being hailed by the royals and wealthy alike as the wedding of the century.  Prince Yoongi of the Blood Moon and Princess Aurora of the Rising Tide wanted a small affair but once the invitations were sent to the other royal houses; it became a huge deal.  With Prince Yoongi being the Mayor of Seoul and with him now being the most powerful man in all of Seoul; the other royal houses started making tributes to the Mins.  One house sent a beautiful white and pearl gown for Princess Aurora, another sent a set of gold crowns adorned with rubies, sapphires, and diamonds, another sent the males of the wedding party custom made black tuxedos, one house insisted on sending all of the flowers for the wedding, and the list goes on.  So much stuff was sent that the wedding was all prepared by outside royal houses.  CL and Hyuna were co-maids of honor and Jungkook and Chanyeol were the best men.  Soojin was the flower girl and the twins were co-ring bearers.  The wedding was presided over by both Elder Jung and Elder Kim.  The other royal houses demanded this so the ceremony could be held in both Latin and Korean.  Over 300 guests occupied the gardens during the wedding ceremony and there was a handful of journalist who were invited and who televised the wedding ceremony.  The reception was for friends, family, and the royal houses only.  And per tradition, it will last for three days.  

The first evening of the reception, a large banquet is held and all gifts are given.  The first evening ends with the coupling ceremony.  The ceremony consists of a blessed rope being tied around the adjoining hands of the married couple and then the elders guiding them to a special tent set up for the next part of the ritual.  Once in the tent, the rope is removed and the couple is striped of their clothes and lead to the union bed.  The heads of all of the royal houses are present for the sacred union.  The first official coupling is to occur under observation to watch for omens from the ancestors.  It is to be performed with no outside assistance such as drugs, elixirs, toys, etc.  Yoongi and Aurora have sex quickly so that the others will be satisfied and leave.  Once the heads of the royal houses are satisfied, Elder Kim and Elder Jung give the couple two small glasses of an elixir called the bonds of Aphrodite.  It is meant to put the drinker into a euphoric state as well as increase arousal.  Yoongi and Aurora are now left alone in the coupling tent.  The tent is then shielded by a spell of silence.  The spell seals the couple inside the tent and prevents them from leaving or any one from entering for twelve hours.  The spell also increases arousal and stamina in the couple.  They are expected to have sex for twelve hours straight.  If they survive then it is seen as a blessing from the ancestors and they will then be crowned King and Queen of Seoul.

The second evening began with a small concert and a banquet.  Prince Yoongi and Princess Aurora emerged from the coupling tent and entered the banquet tent.  Both have been bathed and adorned in attire fit for a future King and Queen.  Prince Yoongi is dressed in a beautiful red and black velvet suit while Princess Aurora is dressed in a floor length gown of red and black.  They are presented to the attending as the future King and Queen of Seoul.  The banquet continued and no obstacles presented themselves.  This evening more for the guests then it is the couple.  The guests are given an opportunity to either praise the couple or to denounce the couple.  Since there was no objections to them becoming King and Queen, the evening goes well and is concluded by a sequestering of the couple separately.  

Elder Kim accompanied Prince Yoongi to the preparation room and Elder Jung accompanied Princess Aurora.  The preparation room is where they will be cleaned, purified, oiled with sacred oils, and dressed for the coronation.  The coronation is to occur on the third night under the moon.  Yoongi and Aurora are allowed a few hours sleep before the arduous process begins.  Once prepared, they were lead by the Elders to the chamber of communication.  They were given the elixir of living death and are laid of satin bed rolls.  The elixir of living death allows the drinker to communicate with the dead and in their case their parents.  Once they were done, they were then lead to the gardens for the completion of the coronation.  

After the coronation, the guests are partake in the last feast for the wedding.  The banquet ends and all of the heads of the royal houses leave with their entourages.  The remaining friends and family stay for the next week to help the King and Queen with necessary royal obligations.  

Life returns to normal for the next 5 months.  The Min siblings running the city and rebuilding it.  Their spouses enjoying establishing the academy and beginning classes.  The elementals and the alcolytes have successfully established the magic academy in Busan and have a full house now.  Hyuna and the “Dolls” have almost doubled the revenue brought in by the clubs in Daegu and Jinhwan has decided to start an academy in Daegu for beings without magical powers or minimal powers.  King Yoongi gave his blessing and like the other academies, it is flourishing.  

The Min compound has been a flurry of activity lately because they are preparing for the birth of the royal heirs.  Midwives have been brought in and Elder Kim and Elder Jung have temporarily moved into the house.  The day continues to draw near.  The staff is excited because the royal heirs will be the first births in the house in over a hundred years.  It had been so long in fact that the birthing chamber in the basement had to be rebuilt and rechristened.  

“It will be soon.”  The doctor tells the King.
